item.title: About MMORPGs
item.description: MMORPG——Massively Multiplayer Online Role Playing Games，翻译过来就是大型在线角色扮演类游戏，也就是网游。 今儿个中午看央视12套，就又在讲网游害人，沉迷网游导致犯罪的青少年比比皆是。顿时想，天天听到看到的这些全是国内的，不晓得国外是否也是如此。遂借助搜索引擎的power，上网一搜，还真小有所获。 ＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝国外主流媒体一例＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝＝ 原文地址：Don’t Read This Or you may be an Internet addict 摘自《华尔街日报》REVIEW & OUTLOOK版 Friday, August 11, 2006 12:01 a.m. EDT article就是最近发表的，摘俩段： Accounts of the scourge pour in from around the globe. The University of Texas at Dallas offers advice for compulsive Internet users alongside information about eating disorders. In some countries, it has become an official matter, too. A government public-awareness campaign in Zurich cautions the Swiss: “Spending lots of time in virtual worlds, especially chat rooms, online games and sex sites, can lead to a dependence comparable to other addictions.
